Question Start Here --------->
 
	1 a).Write a menu based program to set a particular bit and to know the status of particular bit.

 	  b).Write a program to print the prime numbers between 5000 to 1000 whose last digit is 3.

Question Start Here --------->
 
	2 a).Write a menu based program to clear a particular bit and compliment of  particular bit.

	  b).write a program to print the palindrome nos between 2000 to 5000
